producers.name: person_producer
producers.sql:
SELECT id, updated_at
FROM content.person
WHERE updated_at > %s
ORDER BY updated_at
LIMIT %s;

producers.name: genre_producer
producers.sql:
SELECT id, updated_at
FROM content.genre
WHERE updated_at > %s
ORDER BY updated_at
LIMIT %s;

producers.name: film_work_producer
producers.sql:
SELECT id, updated_at
	FROM content.film_work
WHERE updated_at > %s
ORDER BY updated_at
LIMIT %s;

enrichers.name: film_work_person_enricher
enrichers.sql:
SELECT fw.id
FROM content.film_work fw
LEFT JOIN content.person_film_work pfw ON pfw.film_work_id = fw.id
WHERE pfw.person_id IN %s;

enrichers.name: film_work_genre_enricher
enrichers.sql:
SELECT fw.id
FROM content.film_work fw
LEFT JOIN content.genre_film_work gfw ON gfw.film_work_id = fw.id
WHERE gfw.genre_id IN %s;

mergers.name: film_work_merger
mergers.sql:
SELECT
    fw.id as fw_uuid,
    fw.title,
    fw.description,
    fw.rating,
    fw.type,
    fw.created_at,
    fw.updated_at,
    pfw.role,
    p.id as person_uuid,
    p.full_name,
    g.id as genre_uuid,
    g.name
FROM content.film_work fw
LEFT JOIN content.person_film_work pfw ON pfw.film_work_id = fw.id
LEFT JOIN content.person p ON p.id = pfw.person_id
LEFT JOIN content.genre_film_work gfw ON gfw.film_work_id = fw.id
LEFT JOIN content.genre g ON g.id = gfw.genre_id
WHERE fw.id IN %s
ORDER BY fw.id;

mergers.name: person_merger
mergers.sql:
SELECT id as uuid, full_name
FROM content.person
WHERE id IN %s
ORDER BY id;

mergers.name: genre_merger
mergers.sql:
SELECT id as uuid, name
FROM content.genre
WHERE id IN %s
ORDER BY id;
